page.title: 12SANDY LEISURETIME ACTIVITIES
page.content: IN SANDY THERE ARE MANY CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS WHICH PEOPLE CAN JOIN FOR THEIR HOBBIES. THERE ARE CLUBS FOR ALL DIFFERENT AGES. FOR THE YOUNGER MEMBERS OF THE COMMUNITY THERE ARE FOOTBALL, YOUTH CLUB, CUBS, BROWNIES, BEAVERS, SCOUTS, GUIDES, VENTURE SCOUTS, DANCING LESSONS AND SCOUT BAND. THE SPORTS FACILITIES AT SANDY COMMUNITY CENTRE INCLUDE BADMINTON, SQUASH, TENNIS AND KEEP FIT. OTHER SPORTS COVERED INCLUDE FOOTBALL, CRICKET, BOWLS, HOCKEY (FOR LADIES), SNOOKER AND DARTS. FOR THE LESS ENERGETIC ARE FLOWER ARRANGING, LACE MAKING, BINGO, SINGING AND HAND BELL RINGING.
